games.name: Mass Effect
games.description: Intergalactic space game, based in its own galaxy and universe, where you, the mian character, amasses a crew and fly around saving the world and stopping the reapers and the collectors.

review.author: Chad Durkin
review.note: Fun, immersive, action packed, I give it 4 out of 5

games.name: POKe`MON
games.description: Your a ten year old kid that captures monsters and takes down an entire corperation

review.author: Derek Villars
review.note: great fun for all ages!!! 10 outa 10 pokeballs

games.name: Legend of Zelda
games.description: You're a mute, who's name is not Zelda, who saves the queen

review.author: Chad Durkin
review.note: Great dungeon crawling,a ction based, rpg, 4 out of 5

games.name: MONOPOLY
games.description: A free for all turn based game, where you buy property, screw people out of their money, and ruin friendships.

review.author: Derek Villars
review.note: great fun for all ages!!! family friendly! 10 outa 10

games.name: Connect Four
games.description: A 2 player board game that each player is trying to put their pieces in the grid so that they get 4 in a row.

review.author: Chad Durkin
review.note: Nice to have a little competition with your friends in connect 4, 5 out of 5!
